name: Seeker (itch) (MatrixWayne)
description:
This is a 2D-Platformer Game. It has three different levels. Each level will introduce you a new game mechanic. It's not a hard game, but if you want to win, you also need show your technique.

Remember! Practice is only way to beat the game!

Good Luck!

How to Play:

Keyboard:
Press "A" and "D"  to control Direction
Press "Space" to Jump

Xbox Controller:
Using "Left Stick" to control Direction
Press "A" button to Jump

Tips: You could jump in the air again and change the direction. 

When you are Ready! Click "Start"!
